website_summaries.verdict: Hook up to power anywhere it's available and know your equipment will be safe when running through the rain.
pros: High marks for quality of design in addition to the amount of details that went into small things such pockets and strong zippers
Engineered for ease of use, featuring a USB port in the front
We love the stylish design as well
cons: Could provide too much space for some who use the backpack for professional use

customer_reviews.title: Organized in style
customer_reviews.text: I teach at a university and find this backpack, with the pouch for my laptop, to be a real organizing timesaver. I can put my dry erase markers in the outside pocket so I'm ready to write on the board, and there is another pocket where I can keep all those connector do-dads so I can connect up my laptop to whatever projector happens to be in the classroom. I keep a water bottle on the outside. Very stylish, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lipoti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Got this new backpack for senior year and I love it. I actually didn't really end up using the usb port that's on the outside but the backpack itself is designed really nicely. I even found a laptop case (link below )that matches the backpack exactly and fits in the location meant for the laptop. It's perfect if you want to add more protection for a new laptop. The bottom of the backpack beneath the spot for the laptop does not have that much padding either, so keep that in mind if you tend to drop you backpack a lot from waist height. Other than that, I love it and I highly recommend it! Laptop case link:
customer_reviews.author: Donia Mobli

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Durable, Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bag. It's a great size for carrying all school essentials and is sturdy enough to hold up to carrying a heavy load. The straps are very well sewn and durable. The material is a thick canvas that is very durable and stands up against regular wear and tear and the elements. There are tons of pockets for keeping everything organized and safe. The zippers all run well and stay zipped. The back and straps are nicely padded and there's an additional pocket on the back to keep valuables such as a phone safe and secure. Overall, this is an attractive, durable, and roomy bag and I certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BethTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Nice pockets, well padded, like charging feature and pocket that faces body.
customer_reviews.text: Like this pack - put my charger inside and liked that my phone was charging in outside pocket. Especially like the pocket on the outside that faces the body. Have important papers there, checkbook, passport, etc. and they feel safe. Well padded for laptop inside and like the miscellaneous pockets throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Finley

customer_reviews.title: 1 Month Review: Zipper broken, incredibly uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Even if the main zipper wasn't already broken before the 1 month mark, I still wouldn't continue using this backpack because of how uncomfortable it is. The HORRIBLE straps, which are only adjustable in 1 place, unlike literally every other backpack, are abrasive, stiff, and wide on the deltoids and chest. This backpack literally cuts off circulation to my arms if it's tight because of the strap shape. This backpack shifts all the weight into your lower/middle back, making for the most painful walking experience of your life. Even if you just have a couple lbs in the bag, it will strain your back because of the awkward weight distribution.
customer_reviews.author: RandomInternetGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Comfy & practical & durable
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with my new back pack. Had for a couple months now, super durable. Easy to pack everything I need. Makes organizing easy. I use it as a diaper backpack mostly. The charger portal is pretty cool! nice lil pocket on the inside to hold the charger and cords. I love the double "water bottle/ phone holder" pockets on the outside! it's very comfortable too! Lots of space inside but not bulky on your back! I wish I would have had this all along over my traditional diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: TxMom1

customer_reviews.title: Great for work or college students
customer_reviews.text: I run through laptop bags pretty quickly. It seems on kind of hard on my things and maybe it's because I use them every day and they end up on the floor come of the carseat cannot what have you but this one has held up very well so far. It is secure and thick and has plenty of Room for my laptop in addition to my phone and a special pocket where you could place your phone or a charger and run the ear buds through so you don't have to hold it in your hand while you have the backpack on. I think that's a pretty neat feature .
customer_reviews.author: texaschristina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish - very stylish, and usb friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: ✅ Stylish, functional backpack ✅ The exposed usb port is VERY useful! ✅ Zippers are high quality, stitching is great Cons: 🍅 The bag is a little on the small side. Summary: My daughter was very interested in this bag because of the accessible usb port - and she likes the overall design of the bag, however, it is a bit on the small side for her everyday school needs. Still a bag that she will use regularly, but may not be big enough for an every-day school bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hurstclan

customer_reviews.title: I had a lot of expectations due to the good reviews but the quality of the bag I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of expectations due to the good reviews but the quality of the bag I got was very disappointing. The external USB port is not usable because of a bad sewing. I just can't enter the USB cable. The zipper is very poorly made and the front of the bag looks distorted (probably again because of a bad sewing). I really regret buying this bag and I would have returned it immediately but I needed the bag asap.
customer_reviews.author: Arnon

customer_reviews.title: So much room for a mother on the go!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this backpack for its practicality and look! I am a teacher and use it to carry my laptop, papers and so much more! It has tons of room and extra storage pockets!! We also travel a ton and I use this backpack as my carry on bag! I always travel with my two young boys. This backpack easily holds my laptop and their 2 large iPads with bulky covers plus more!! Oh, and it also has a built in charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and great fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, nicely made and great fabric. Looks very chic compared to most traditional backpacks and is lightweight but not flimsy. It fits a big, hard sided computer laptop case for school in the main compartment, but not in the inside sleeve which suits me fine. I can use that padded inside sleeve for documents. Very classy and sleek looking, which is rare for a backpack! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably Secure
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for about two months now and I have to say it’s definitely comfortable, spacious two qualities I feel like a backpack should prioritize. I’ve not extensively tested it’s water resistance but it’s good enough to survive the occasional rainstorm at the bus stop so I can’t complain. Strongly recommend if you need a good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Williams

customer_reviews.title: USB Port Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Something with the connection for the USB port is off. I have plugged in my portable charger to the back pack and tried to use the outter USB port to charge my phone, but the phone simply acknowledges that it has been plugged in, but does not charge. Will update if I figure out the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Stoker

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling, comfortable handles
customer_reviews.text: This has been my travel back pack for many trips. The handles are very comfortable and the space inside makes you throw away your wheeled carry on. It has a huge space, got to fit a week of cloth on it. Bought this because of the USB adapter but haven't use it that much. It has 3 bags inside, 2 compartments on the outside, a compartment for wallet storage on your back and 2 bottle holders.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio H.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is cheap and will break
customer_reviews.text: This is the second backpack I have had to order. The first backpack the zipper broke the moment I first opened the bad. Now I am having the same zipper problems with his second bag that I have had for 7 days. The material must be so cheap that the zipper becomes undone almost instantly. I like the style of the bag but I wish there was an option for better quality materials. I would not mind paying the extra for it. I don't want to experience these zippers problems when I am leaving a classroom and have to rush to my next class. It is a big pain...
customer_reviews.author: Erick Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack not black
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great backpack. it is a perfect size and very comfortable, great for travel, school etc. It has a very professional look and feels to it and also great stitching. Lots of zippers great padding and lots of pockets. The only thing I would say is that I got mine in black and it is more of a charcoal space gray then it is actually black.
customer_reviews.author: BluMethal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: While there are a lot of backpacks on the market, this one is unique as it has a USB port connection so you can easily charge a device. Very nice oxford material and lining on the inside. Plenty of pocket space to carry you items. The shoulder straps have a bit of padding, but the padding on the back is well done. The backpack holds up to a 15.6: laptop. Overall, nice backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Scheck

customer_reviews.title: In love with these backpack
customer_reviews.text: In love with these backpack, perfect size, has a lot of compartments and fits a thermos on one side and a small umbrella on other size, easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pellerano

customer_reviews.title: Zipper does NOT last longer than a month.
customer_reviews.text: This review was a long time coming but about a month into owning the bag, the zipper doesn't stay closed. Whether zipping or unzipping, the main pulley just slides along the zipper and doesn't close. I only use this to pack lunches to work and might a sweater or two, nothing heavy was ever transported. REALLY cheaply made zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the perfect size for traveling. I plan on taking my clothes and accessories for an entire weekend and have already tested to see if everything fits. I love all the pockets on the inside and out. The pocket on the back of the backpack is where I plan on putting my sensitive materials (passport, DL, Money) because it will be the closest to my body.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Would recomend this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the bag I feels really nice, lots of zippers, a lot of room for your books incase you are in college and in need of space, the back support is amazing! It fits my laptop really well and I didn't felt nervous when I try to lay my backpack down as a ordinary bag and I felt safe doing that and I feel more safe that its water resistance, the USB was nice and my charger could fit in my bag without a problem. I would recommend this to someone who is interested in purchasing this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for mainly the use of taking it to Europe with me. During my time in London it rained everyday and the packpack did not get wet at all and stayed dry so it's very reliable in that sense. The only thing thing I did not like was that there was not enough room for a lot of things so I don't recommend it for putting big binders in. If you just have a laptop, notebook, and folder then it would be completely fine. The USB port is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: checkersperson

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke first time in use!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I loved the style of this backpack and bought it a couple of months in advance of a trip. Decided not to use it for the trip (a hiking adventure) but to preserve it for a business conference, another month later. Took the backpack on a plane and as soon as it was loaded in the airport, the zipper broke! Just as another reviewer experienced. Because I waited so long to try it out for real, I do not qualify for an Amazon refund. Now I am busy trying to connect with the company to see if I can get it replaced. BIG BUMMER.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: NOT water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my daughter and son because it said it's water resistant. Today my daughter got caught in the rain, and everything in the bag got wet, including her laptop. I'm really dissapointed by this, Thank God, her laptop seems ok for now. I recommended the product to my friends, because my kids really loved it, because it fits everything. And just a few days ago I bought another one as a father's day present for my brother in law, got an email today that it has shipped, but I'm thinking in returning it when it gets here.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: External port breaks off!!
customer_reviews.text: The outside looks really good, and with the external charging port made this bag very useful. But, after having it for a month, the port broke on it. The adhesive holding the port up broke off, and fell inside the bag's stitching somewhere. So i am happy about the bag's looks, but not the technical side of it. Which was my main use for it. It could be that the port might be defective, but with all of the good reviews on this product i expected better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh S.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son, a new 9th grader. He really likes it and says it's very comfortable. He'll be taking his backpack into each class so comfort is important. It's roomy without being huge. The only issue is that a standard lunchbox doesn't fit too well with books but he likes the backpack enough that he'll make do.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, durable bag. Really awesome for any purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! I use it for work, travel, hiking, etc etc etc. It's very flexible and durable! The charging port is convenient as well. I get a lot of compliments. I've had this bag for 2 years now and it's still in tip top shape!
customer_reviews.author: Waerok

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The zipper breaks if you put anything that weighs more than 2lbs in the backpack. Not good for travelling with a laptop of any size. I've had this since may, it's August 3 and the zipper has always done this but today it completely broke and won't zip at all. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Smuckeroo

customer_reviews.title: Zippers break easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my 13 year old son for school. We are only a month in to school and all the zippers busted. We are a week past the return period so I guess I am just out. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to purchase this bookbag. When I received it, it was in good condition and seemed like the perfect buy. In the middle of me and my boyfriend moving, one of the straps snapped. I claimed a file with the insurance company and that was 2 months ago and unfortunately I’ve gotten no response. I’m very disappointed with the quality of the bag and the service provided by the insurance company. I would say to Not purchase this bag and the insurance company sucks. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Yusi

customer_reviews.title: Broke 3 Months After Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I already was not in love with the bag--it's stiff, and there's not a good place to store pens and pencils--then, 3 months after purchase (with light to moderate use), one of the zipper handles broke. Moreover, it was not possible to get in touch with the manufacturer, who doesn't seem to have a phone number. Luckily, Amazon helped make it right, but I wish I had bought a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: ECT

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this and was happy with it when he opened up the package. Nice quality, mature looking. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngrace99

customer_reviews.title: BEST BACKPACK EVER
customer_reviews.text: Originally it was larger than I thought it was going to be, but this bag has more than lived up to expectations. It's water resistant (I've been caught in downpours and nothing inside got wet), it's very sturdy, and it does a great job protecting your items. Seriously. It got run over on accident and nothing inside (including electronics) broke. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It looks thin, but it fits a whole lot. I have used it in place of my carry-on suitcase for flights. Everything fits perfectly. My only complaint is I wish there were more pockets or storage in very front for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlyn R

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. The front pocket is kind of useless. It would be very easy for someone to walk up behind you and easily unzip it. It needs to be concealed.
customer_reviews.author: swg

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy backpack. My high school teen has been using ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy backpack. My high school teen has been using it for about a month, carrying heavy books, gym clothes, etc...and it still looks brand new. The compartments are a nice size to hold everything. He especially likes the hidden compartment on the back to keep his phone and wallet safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I like the style and patter of the dark version
customer_reviews.text: The book bag is durable. I like the style and patter of the dark version. Some of the little stuff has been bothering me like not having double zippers for the second section and it has been a bit difficult and was annoying for me to fit a 2inch-binder in with some of the other composition notebooks, but everything else is great. For me, the book bag does not feel too thin and I'm happy about that. It sure is water resistant but sometimes it absorbs some of the water and it makes the surface layer a bit damp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag and it seems sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag and it seems sturdy so far, but It isn't very big on the inside. It holds my laptop but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and filled with plenty of pockets for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and filled with plenty of pockets for storage! It’s very clean looking and low key (I don’t like flashy). It was exactly what I was looking for. Definitely high quality for an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn D'Aguanno

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful of the Zippers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this backpack...I really did! Everything about it was fantastic... Except that the main zipper broke first thing. I was so sad! Other than that, the power bank feature is a fantastic addition to this bag. It has many pockets and the general quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rofkar

customer_reviews.title: I love the look, the design not so much
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the bag itself and the sleek cool design but I have a few complaints. First of the zippers are not nearly as good quality as they could be, the secondary pocket from the front has the zipper not connect together properly and you have to go back and forth and fidget with it til it fixes itself. Second is the usb plug, it is fairly practical but the port is loose and has a possibility to come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Subterfuge

customer_reviews.title: This backpack was good enough to take into work
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was good enough to take into work. The battery thing is overrated but it does seem relatively water resistant and has nice pockets and very comfortable straps / back section
customer_reviews.author: Happycollegekid

customer_reviews.title: It is what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bag and it really suits me for the purpose of going on day trips and taking my laptop. I am a writer and I like to do my work at cafes. . I needed a bag that was good looking and durable and this bag does a wonderful job for me. It was a good price, Amazon shipping was great and I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Author Matthew Robert Payne

customer_reviews.title: Computer Backpack or Carry-on...You Choose
customer_reviews.text: This big and very roomy. So it's more suited for travel than for your routine work sessions at Starbucks. Very modernistic design. Zippers are smooth. Sufficient compartments for two laptops, a tablet and a plethora of accessories. Built to last. Highly recommended. ....In fact come to think of it, you can use this as your carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveLogic

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, love the options!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great school bag - so far. I have a small power brick running to the USB, which is very handy. I can't say anything about the durability (yet) but it seems nice. If it holds up from my sons abuse, I will update this review. If not? I will also update it. But so far we really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas E. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Zipper was already broken when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: While it was the size I wanted and everything I needed fit in it perfectly, the zipper for the main area where my laptop is stored was broken when the bag arrived. That was very disappointing. Most of the reviews I had read for this backpack were very good so I expected something that was made better.
customer_reviews.author: Kangie04

customer_reviews.title: Poor zipper
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has been used for same time when the zipper stopped closing the backpack. It just opened after closing and the sides do not stick together any longer. We have been very satisfied with the backpack before but now it can not be used anymore. I choose the backpack because I thought it had a good quality and it was not cheap. I presupposed the zipper to work longer then some months.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Larsson

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I’m enjoying this backpack! It has a lot of good pockets, looks very nice, but still doesn’t feel too huge (even though it easily held everything I needed for a two day trip). I will say that I am a “light” packer (only the necessities).
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: i would’ve given the backpack 5 stars except for the ...
customer_reviews.text: i would’ve given the backpack 5 stars except for the fact the main zipper split the first time I used it. Update: I’ve lowered the stars down to one. First day the main zipper split while I was zipping it back up with absolutely nothing in it. One week later the front pockets zipper pull snapped apart and fell off. I had high hopes for this thing but I am super disappointed in this backpack, buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has a bad zipper. I returned one and purchased a second. Both had the same problem. The zipper separates in the middle of the zipper section.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my son because his phone is never charged. Luckily he already had a portable charger that fit perfectly in the zipper pouch of the bag. Great stylish backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Dani M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the dofferent compartments
customer_reviews.text: This bookbag is VERY durable! I love the dofferent compartments! So glad I purchased one. And I also brought my best friend one as a gift! It's for men and women.. I would buy another if my job didn't require us to have clear-like bags now...
customer_reviews.author: Hunni2Beez

customer_reviews.title: Its nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. I wish it had more pockets and that the cord was removable because it gets annoying. Also there's no flap over the middle zipper or most of the small front zipper so your stuff will still get damp when it rains. Otherwise it's a nice backpack I've used everyday for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: love this bag
customer_reviews.text: love this bag. bought to come on a trip for a graduation. my phone is never charged and people in the airport looked at me with jealous eyes while I was walking and charging, they were stuck to the charging area. worth the money for this trip alone.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Bad zippers show poor construction = waste of $
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and all the pockets, but it's poorly made. Zippers breaking off (per another reviewer's comments from September which I should have read before I purchased this) despite very light use (took on two 1 day business trips). Waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: Enukt NYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: The inside charging cable gets in the way more than I find it useful, however the bag has held up nicely with daily use for the past 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter since they use laptop in class. She can keep her tablet and phone charge. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET D. SYDNOR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this backpack for just about everything. It is really well made I’ve had it for about 3 years now and nothing is wearing at all. It has withstood all different weather conditions and has been one of my most impressive buys from amazon so far... hence me writing a review 3 years later!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Inner net mesh falling apart. The outside USB port slips inside backpack and has to be relocated and when it does go back into it's place the connected wire falls right out. Also very small, barely fits two binders.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Cool features, many pockets
customer_reviews.text: Overall stylish backpack, a little bit long however, but I don't mind. Cool features, many pockets. However after 1-2 months the zipper fell off... Another downside is the brand name on the backpack says KAKA.
customer_reviews.author: Uyen

customer_reviews.title: A College Students Best friend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book bag for my classes, and never had an issues after that, light weight and water resistant! What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Mrhorton2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Backpack Can Charge Your Cell Phone Too!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this backpack. Not only is it sturdy, but she can use it to charge her phone! Very well made and seems like it will hold up a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Dement

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack! Its functional and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack! Its functional and very comfortable. The look is classic and professional. I would recommend this to anyone from a student to a busy young professional.
customer_reviews.author: Punit S

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: A good backpack. Not quite as many pockets as I’d like, not as waterproof as I’d like, and does a mildly annoying folding thing when not totally full. But it is stylish, good quality, and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shanae

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Received almost immediately from vendor. Back pak was as stated and charger! Thank you! More than happy!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Nannini

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack and well thoughtout wilts pockets and design
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack and well thoughtout with pockets and design. Main zipper is a bit difficult with double zipper & flap but still 5 Star imo.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great and holds enough but the USB connector stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great and holds enough but the USB connector stopped working. So i just purchased a longer charging cord to come out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Meh quality
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke on this after a month. It is to small to fit anything inside other than a laptop and its charger. It’s very portable for flying around with but not very durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Moo man

customer_reviews.title: I love this back pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack. I have been using it for a couple months now and it is sturdy, durable, and convenient. I hold my laptop and several books and it feels light and comfortable. The straps have cushions that make it easy to carry when there is a lot of stuff in it. I’MVERY SATISFIED with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Webb

customer_reviews.title: great space, looks nice and is water resistant
customer_reviews.text: great minimalist backpack. I haven't used the charging feature but it is water resistant, lots of packets and storage. I am a graduate student and take home a lot of books, notes, papers and my laptop and it fits everything great.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica M.

customer_reviews.title: cool factor
customer_reviews.text: It's got the cool factor as well as very useful style. Seems to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: shopper22

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Compact, not too bulky, but has great organization possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna H

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for traveling and I love the built in charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Longenecker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for various purposes. Haven’t had an issue with mine. I’ve had it for 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: It looks stylish and the charging part is really cool. His laptop fits perfectly and he stores game ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my boyfriend and he LOVES it! It looks stylish and the charging part is really cool. His laptop fits perfectly and he stores game controllers, his charger and magic cards in there without it looking bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is not at all near being a water ...

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, but the USB-port may become loose.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the backpack is good and seems durable. There are a few issues though: - The USB-port at the bag may become loose and be pushed in. Could probably be glued back, but that should be improved upon.

product_meta.title: ibagbar Water Resistant Laptop Backpack with USB Charging Port Fits up to 15.6-Inch Laptop and Notebook Black
product_meta.description:
Our Ibagbar Water Resistant Laptop Backpack Bag with USB Charging Port
- Reserve now and protect your belongings from water and never run out of battery during travels.

The Features and Benefits:

✔ Top Notch Quality
- This business laptop backpack is made of water-resistant polyester with durable stitching & high-quality zippers that will never break or damaged easily and will last a lifetime.
- Bring it anywhere with you, at work, business travels and vacations, school, shopping, etc. fits any weather condition either rainy, winter or summer no problem.
- Water resistant action that will protect from spills, drips or rain pours.

✔ Smart & Unique Design
- Our large computer bag has one separate laptop compartment which can fit 12"- 17" inches.
- Main compartments can fit clothes, books/magazine, iPod, tablet and other things that can fit inside.
- Front compartment for keys, ID card, makeup pouch, power bank, mobile phone & camera.
- Anti-Theft Back mesh compartment is for your valuable things, like cell phone, wallet, credit card and money which no one can get it, since you're the only one who can access it on your back.
- The right shoulder strap has a metal D ring which you can attach your other accessories like water bottles or pouch.
- The left strap has a sunglasses holder so you can access it anytime you want.
- Side slot for charging cables so you can charge your gadgets anywhere you go, and the side pockets for drinking bottles or umbrella holder.

✔ Breathable & Comfortable
- Multi-panel airflow design provides an extra padding for comfort and maximum back support when carrying.
- Shoulder straps that can be adjusted to your convenience and has a padding for maximum comfort when carrying and a hand strap if you wish to hold it in your hand.

Click the ADD TO CART at the top of the page and BUY the best deal on the market!
feature_bullets: ✓ TOP QUALITY WATER RESISTANT LAPTOP BACKPACK - Our Laptop Backpack is made of strong water resistant oxford material. It a long-lasting lightweight computer bag for men and women with padded shoulder straps. Try it now RISK-FREE with our Money Back Guarantee.

✓ EASY TO ORGANIZE YOUR BELONGINGS - This notebook bag has multiple compartments and a zippered pocket where you can store your laptop, phone, wallet, clothes and more. Its perfect for business, school, office or any outdoor activity. It measures 12.5"L x 19"H x 6.5"W. It can hold laptops up to 15.6-inch.

✓ EXTRA SAFE WITH USB PORT - Our reinforced zipper pocket increases the safety and allows you to secure your bag with a padlock if you want to. It also has a USB charging port so you can easy and quick charge any of your devices so your gadget/s will never run out of battery.

✓ THE PERFECT GIFT - Do you know anyone that needs an elegant premium laptop backpack? This would be an amazing gift for your dad, mom, sibling or boyfriend etc. Great for birthdays, Christmas, graduation and much more.

✓ OUR PROMISE TO YOU - We got you covered! Your purchase includes a hassle-free 30 days Money Back Guarantee. If you for any reason don't like your brand new Laptop Bag simply return it for a FULL REFUND. No questions asked.
